sqlMap.select: select user_id userId ,user_name userName, strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S',create_date) createDate from tb_user where user_id = #userId#

select privilege_Id from tb_privilege where 1=1
url = #url#
privilege_Id = #privilegeId#
privilege_Id = #privilege#

select 1 from tb_module where 1=1
module = #module#
module_id = #moduleId#
par_module_id = #parModuleId#
par_module = #parModule#

select 1 from tb_privilege_user_relation a , tb_privilege b, tb_group c , tb_group_user_relation d, tb_user e where a.[privilege_id] = b.[privilege_id] and a.status_cd = 1000 and ( (a.[obj_id]=c.[group_id] and a.[obj_type]='GR' and c.[group_id] = d.[group_id] and e.[user_id]=d.[user_id] and d.status_cd = 100) or (a.[obj_id]= e.[user_id] and a.[obj_type]='UR') ) and e.[user_id] = #userId#
b.[privilege_id] = #privilegeId#
b.privilege = #privilege#
b.url = #url#

select 1 from tb_module_user_relation a,tb_user b, tb_group c, tb_group_user_relation d where a.status_cd = 1000 and ((a.obj_type='GR' and a.obj_id=c.group_id and c.group_id = d.group_id and d.user_id = b.user_id and d.status_cd = 1000) or (a.obj_type='UR' and a.obj_id = b.user_id)) and b.user_id = #userId#
a.module_id= #moduleId#
a.child_module_id = #childModuleId#
a.module= #module#
a.child_module = #childModule#

select 1 from tb_privilege_user_relation where 1=1
privilege_id = #privilegeId#
privilege = #privilege#
url = #url#
